|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "HIR409", "1034089_X0", and '''0301''' is silkscreened on the board of one particular FR1004 (w/ the P/N noted in the infobox). :All the caps on the board are '''SC''' branded.
The 160-pin AMITSOC-0261 may possibly be an R1620 or similar '''RDC''' designed chip. :Earlier generation '''AMIT''' devices were Am186x based, R1620 uses the 186 instruction set
===Possible included PSU(s)=== The power supply included with the device may have been a '''Fairway Electronic''' TC10A-50.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Fairway Electronic |model = TC10A-50 |input_v=100-240 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=medium, straight |countrymanuf = China }}
==Links of Interest== *[https://gathering.tweakers.net/forum/list_messages/984121/3 '''gathering-tweakers.net''' thread w/ photos of another AMITSOC-0261 device]
